title: Boutique Private Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Escape to a private beach in tropical Vanuatu and enjoy a barefoot island escape at the award-winning Poppy’s on the Lagoon Resort. Wake up to sparkling blues and striking views and enjoy a daily continental breakfast, one two-course dinner, daily glass of wine or beer, 30-minute massage each, use of non-motorised water activities and a Poppy’s Pass offering discounts on offers for the resort.
offer_address: Captain Cook Av Seaside Port Vila Efate, Vanuatu
